thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Vale CEO expects first quarter results in line with fourth quarter

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Vale CEO expects first quarter results in line with fourth quarter
text:
RIO DE JANEIRO, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Brazilian miner Vale should achieve results in the first quarter that are similar to those in the final three months of 2017, even though the January to March period is usually weaker, Chief Executive Officer Fabio Schvartsman said on Wednesday.
Speaking a day after the worldâ€™s top iron ore producer reported a nearly 50 percent jump in profit in the fourth quarter, executives also said they forecast iron ore prices to be sustained by economic growth and growing steel output. (Reporting by Marta Nogueira and Alexandra Alper Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
